body:
My previous tests was installed with the stub installer. I have now also tested using the non-stub installer, and it also worked.

Another interesting thing heartbeats won't show the first time a profile is started, since we don't show heartbeats if we aren't confident that our storage is durable (this prevents spamming people with security add-ons). Only on the second start up will we have enough information be confident in showing heartbeats.
